name: Splink: A Split Thinking Game
description:
INFO: The game is pretty buggy,
we will update it in the coming weeks Tested on macOS using 8BitDo SN30 Pro controllers. The controller scheme is a bit janky so:

Shoot might be the start button,
looking up/down might be left/right,
looking left/right might be the trigger buttons,
and everything else might just be a little messed up 😅

We ran out of time and hope to fix and update the game after the jam!
